## ğŸš€ Quick Start

1. **Fork & Clone**

   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/cs2-tournament-overlay.git
   cd cs2-tournament-overlay
   ```

2. **Install Dependencies**

   ```bash
   yarn install
   ```

3. **Start Development Server**
   ```bash
   yarn dev
   ```

The development server will start at `http://localhost:5173` and be accessible on your network for testing with OBS Browser Source.

## ğŸ› Reporting Issues

Found a bug? Please [open an issue](https://github.com/sivert-io/cs2-tournament-overlay/issues/new) with:

- Clear description
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Environment details (OBS version, browser, OS, etc.)
- Screenshots or video if applicable

## ğŸ’¡ Feature Requests

Have an idea for a new overlay component or feature? We'd love to hear it! Please include:

- Description of the feature
- Use case / motivation
- Mockups or examples if possible

## ğŸ¨ Overlay Development Tips

- Test with OBS Browser Source (1920x1080 recommended)
- Keep animations smooth and non-distracting
- Use transparent backgrounds where appropriate
- Consider performance impact on streaming setups
- Follow CS2 tournament broadcast standards where applicable
